list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: each of a pair of hinged panels, often louvered, fixed inside or outside a window that can be closed for security or privacy or to keep out light.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he threw open the shutters to let in air and light
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta ném mở cửa chớp để để không khí và ánh sáng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a device that opens and closes to expose the film in a camera.
close the shutters of (a window or building).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the windows were shuttered against the afternoon heat
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các cửa sổ bị đóng vào nhiệt độ nóng
